Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a buff-coloured pottery vessel, the interior is spotted with a brown resinous deposit, the exterior is covered with a self-slip and remains of four lines of red-painted Coptic text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394703) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394703)
